thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Jialing Industrial Expects To Return To Net Profit In 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Jialing Industrial Expects To Return To Net Profit In 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - china jialing industrial co ltd group

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - China Jialing Industrial Co Ltd Group :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS TO RETURN TO NET PROFIT OF 280-330 MILLION YUAN IN 2017 VERSUS NET LOSS OF 307.8 MILLION YUAN ($48.59 million) YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DQTB6U Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3350 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
